text: Ezɨ Jonatan ko Ahimas, aning ghua Jerusalemɨn azenan Enrogelɨn Fanemɨn me mɨzua iti. Aning ofa gamir gumazimningɨn otarimning. Gumazamiziba aningɨn gantɨ aning nguibar ekiamɨn aven mangan aghuagha, egha aning azenan modoghav iti. Ingangarir amizir mam faragha nguibar ekiar kamɨn otivir bizibar gun aning mɨgei. Ezɨ aning ghua Devit mɨkeme.
